title: problem
content:
Hi guys im trying to attach a jpeg to see if anyone knows a name for the font, but I keep getting this error message

Error attaching file topbar\_red2.jpg: exceeds maximum file size

the jpeg is only 11kb!!

What am I doiing wrong?  
Thanks

Neil
author: NeilE

comments.content: I dont know what the reason for that error may be, but maybe try to temporary upload the image to an image hosting site, like [ImageShack](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020062749/http:/www.imageshack.us/), [YourIMG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020062749/http:/www.yourimg.com/), [TinyPic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020062749/http:/www.tinypic.com/) or [Flickr](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020062749/http:/www.flickr.com/)..
